sentences.sContent: His tongue flicked across his lips.
sentences.sCn: 他的舌头在双唇间快速移动。

remMethod.val: fli(看做fly， 飞) + ck → 轻拍翅膀， 展翅高飞 → 轻拍

words.tran: 闪烁的，忽隐忽现的；摇曳的
闪烁；摇曳；颤动；扑动翅膀；假装昏倒

trans.tranOther: to move with a sudden quick movement, or to make something move in this way
to look at a book, magazine, set of pictures etc very quickly
